name: Social Innovation Fund of Ireland
goal: Our purpose is to find and back innovative solutions to critical social issues in Ireland. Our mission is to provide cash grants and business supports to non-profit organisations so they can scale up, reach as many people as possible and have a widespread impact on critical social problems such as unemployment, poverty and health. Our vision is to create the worldâ€™s best eco-system for social innovation in Ireland.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: As well as leading on social innovation in Ireland we have a parallel objective of developing a culture of philanthropy in Ireland. This work brings us into to contact with government officials and policymakers. We are also a member of the European Venture Philanthropy Association.
